Description:
The Vineyards Boutique Hotel & SPA boasts 2 outdoor swimming pools, one of which is a childrens pool, a pool bar, spa and wellness area, tour desk and shops and supermarkets. It is 4 km from Aheloys beaches.

Modern rooms at The Vineyards Boutique Hotel & SPA are air conditioned and have a minibar, balcony with pool views and flat-screen cable TV. Bathrooms come with a hairdryer, free toiletries and a bath.

The main restaurant serves Bulgarian and Mediterranean cuisine. There is also an English-style pub offering sandwiches, pizzas and barbecued treats. Drinks are also served at the lobby bar and breakfast is available.

Deck chairs and umbrellas are provided at the pool. The hotel also has a doctor on site.

An indoor pool containing mineral water is a highlight of the spa area. There are also several saunas, a hot tub, a Russian Bath and ice room. Massages, mud treatments, manicures and haircuts are also available.

Guests can make use of the games room, table football, fitness centre, table tennis, billiards and computer room. There is also a childrens entertainment room with supervised care.

Car rental, tours and tickets for popular activities in the area can be arranged at the tour desk.
